Desc.entry: Sessions include: adults only, aquatic keep-fit, junior lessons, adult lessons, lane swimming, public swimming, over 50s, splash, junior waterpolo, women only, women and under 5's, aquaerobics. Also available for pool parties.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon-Fri 8am-10pm, Sat 8am-4.30pm, Sun 8am-1pm (opening times); Please contact for details and times of individual sessions
